DataElement.preferredName: Study Protocol Version Responsible Person Type Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the type of entity who is legally responsible for the execution of the study. EXAMPLE(S): PI, sponsor.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Protocol Version Responsible Person Type Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._A person worthy of responsibility or trust or one held accountable.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.
